title: Trying out
creator_credit: Chris O'Rourke, TV Ed Productions and Mornington School Support Centre
brief_description: Dromana Technical College embarked on a goal based assessment project. It was centered on a theatre restaurant where students used a contract system for assessment. The program entails the success of the first trial, with some reservations by the coordinator, Mr. Doug Smith.
creator_credit_for_label: Chris O’Rourke, TV Ed Productions and Mornington School Support Centre
